info.name: Ecommerce Backend API
info.description: Ready-to-import Postman collection for ecommerce-backend_api. Use {{base_url}} (default http://localhost:8000/api). Session login keeps cookies; token login returns Bearer token.

request.description: Session login. Run first to store cookie in Postman.
Token login. Copy response data.token to {{token}}.
Verify current user, roles, permissions.
Register a new customer. Session login automatically after registration.
Session login. Run first to store cookie in Postman. Optional session_token to merge guest cart.
Token login. Copy response data.token to {{token}} for Bearer auth. Optional session_token to merge guest cart.
Get current customer profile. Requires authentication (session or token).
Logout current customer. Requires authentication.
Move a permission group up in the sort order (swap with previous item).
Move a permission group down in the sort order (swap with next item).
List customers with available_points, spent_in_window, next_tier and amount_to_next_tier.
Show customer with loyalty_summary (available_points, total_earned, total_redeemed, window, next_tier).
Create a menu item; response includes its categories list.
Update a menu item; response includes its categories list.
Get all shop settings (shop_contact_widget, homepage_products, etc.)
Get a specific shop setting by key. Supported keys: shop_contact_widget, homepage_products
Update shop contact widget settings (WhatsApp configuration)
Update homepage products settings (new products days, best sellers days)
Get current (active) and history records for loyalty settings.
Create new loyalty settings record.
Fetch a single loyalty setting by id.
Update an existing loyalty setting.
Delete a loyalty setting (soft delete or hard delete depending on backend).
Create a new membership tier rule.
Update or create membership tier rule including product_discount_percent.
Delete a membership tier rule.
Summary of loyalty points, expiring batches and tier info for a customer.
Paginated points transactions for the customer.
List loyalty rewards with optional filters.
Create a new loyalty reward.
Update an existing loyalty reward.
Delete a loyalty reward.
List redemption records with filters.
Fetch redemption detail including meta.
Mark redemption as completed or cancelled.
List all notification templates.
Create a new notification template.
Fetch notification template by id.
Update an existing notification template.
Delete a notification template.
List announcements with optional filters.
Create a new announcement. Upload image using image_file field. sort_order is automatically set to the next available value. You can also use image_path to provide a direct path instead of uploading.
Fetch announcement by id.
Update an existing announcement. Upload new image using image_file field, or use image_path to provide a direct path. Old uploaded image will be deleted if a new one is uploaded.
Delete an announcement.
Move an announcement up in the sort order (swap with previous item).
Move an announcement down in the sort order (swap with next item).
List marquees with optional filters.
Create a new marquee. sort_order is automatically set to the next available value.
Fetch marquee by id.
Update an existing marquee.
Delete a marquee.
Move a marquee up in the sort order (swap with previous item).
Move a marquee down in the sort order (swap with next item).
List home sliders with optional filters.

Create a new home slider. Upload image_file (required) and mobile_image_file (optional). sort_order is automatically set to the next available value. You can also use image_path and mobile_image_path instead of file uploads.
Fetch home slider by id.

Update an existing home slider. Upload image_file and/or mobile_image_file to replace existing images. Old uploaded images will be automatically deleted. You can also use image_path and mobile_image_path instead of file uploads.
Delete a home slider.
Move a home slider up in the sort order (swap with previous item).
Move a home slider down in the sort order (swap with next item).
List active menu items with their active categories (ordered by pivot sort_order).
List active categories; filter by menu_id or menu_slug; response includes menu_ids array.
Get a single menu item with its categories.
List active and current announcements. Optionally filter by key.
Get a single active and current announcement by key.
Get active home sliders for public display.
Get homepage data including sliders, promotions, marquees, announcements, shop menu, and SEO settings.

request.description: Preview checkout calculation including subtotal, discount, shipping fee, and grand total. Voucher response includes applied flag, eligible_subtotal, discount_amount, message, and display_scope_text when voucher_code is provided.
Get sales overview report. Requires permission: ecommerce.reports.sales.view
Get daily sales report. Requires permission: ecommerce.reports.sales.view
Get sales report grouped by category. Requires permission: ecommerce.reports.sales.view
Get top selling products report. Requires permission: ecommerce.reports.sales.view
